from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

from havoc.autoval.lib.host.models.openbmc_bryce_canyon import \
    OpenBMCBryceCanyon
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.system import System
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.bios.models.bryce_canyon_bios import \
    BryceCanyonBios
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval import AutovalUtils


[docs]class BryceCanyon(System):

[docs]    def __init__(self, host):
        super(BryceCanyon, self).__init__(host)
        self.product_name = "BryceCanyon"
        self.bios = BryceCanyonBios(host)
        self.bmc = OpenBMCBryceCanyon



[docs]    def check_project_type(self, fru_details):
        if self.product_name in fru_details:
            return True



[docs]    def inject_dimms_error(self):
        # Inject DIMM uncorrectable errors for DIMMA0, DIMMA1, DIMMB0, DIMMB1
        try:
            base_cmd = "ipmitool raw 0x0A 0x44 0x00 0x01 0x02 0x00 0x00 0x00 0x00 0x01 0x00 0x04 0x0C 0x63 0x6F"
            cmd = base_cmd + " 0xA1 0x00 0x00"
            self.connection.run(cmd)
            cmd = base_cmd + " 0xA1 0x00 0x01"
            self.connection.run(cmd)
            cmd = base_cmd + " 0xA1 0x00 0x08"
            self.connection.run(cmd)
            cmd = base_cmd + " 0xA1 0x00 0x09"
            self.connection.run(cmd)
        except Exception as e:
            AutovalUtils.log_info(str(e))
        return
